text: Tando Allahyar railway station ({{lang-ur|{{Nastaliq|ٹنڈو اللہ یار ریلوے اسٹیشن Sindhi: ٽنڊو الهيار ریلوي اسٽیشن) is located in Tando Allahyar, Sindh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways * Category:Railway stations in Tando Allahyar District Category:Railway stations on Hyderabad–Khokhrapar Branch Line
title: Tando Allahyar railway station
